title: Understanding Protein Analysis
text: To study the physical properties of a protein, we need to focus on its structure, shape, and interactions. This type of analysis is crucial in understanding how proteins function in biological systems.

title: Types of Analysis
text: There are different types of analysis in chemistry: qualitative, quantitative, and characterization. Each serves a different purpose in understanding chemical substances.

title: Characterization Analysis
text: Characterization analysis is used to determine the physical and chemical properties of a substance. It helps in identifying the structure, composition, and behavior of molecules.

title: Choosing the Right Analysis
text: Based on the need to study the physical properties of a protein, which type of analysis should be used?
